title: Victorious Sivir

embed.description: This is a teaser spotlight of Victorious Sivir with ingame gameplay! Skin name is CONFIRMED as Victorious Sivir, particles & SFX may not be final. Check out the other skins in this cycle. Full Skin Spotlight will be released in the near future which will go more indepth.

body:
Take a look at the spotlight before reading on... _(Link attached)_

**Everyone hates this skin.**
If you have a look at the likes and dislikes on that spotlight video alone you can see that my statement is aided by that bar

Victorious {{champion:60}} Elise, sweet
http://michalivan.deviantart.com/art/Victorious-Elise-433343700

Victorious {{champion:25}} Morgana, really nice
https://www.tumblr.com/search/Victorious-Morgana

Victorious {{champion:15}} Sivir, ~~amazing~~ terrible
_(Link attached - champion skin spotlight)_

Sorry to sound so negative, but this skin is a real bummer, I was so optimistic when I saw the teaser, I reallllllly was, then I saw this and I was immediately disappointed. Please do something to change this skin, the blade looks completely stupid, the jagged edges around the blade look particularly bad; so does her outfit, it may as well have been a purple Chroma pack... cmon.... 

Please change this skin before release, nobody is a fan of it. For the people that grinded to Gold+ in the last moments towards the end of season, they're disappointed. Please... **change. **

**Up vote** this if you agree that Riot should change this skin, thanks.

replies.body: To be honest, I was really hyped when riot announced victorious sivir (even though I'm only silver, lol), I really like the purple and gold theme to the more recent victorious skins (Elise and Morgana) and I was really excited to see what riot could do with this colour scheme. When it was finally previewed, I was left feeling a bit disappointed, don't get me wrong I'm not complaining about how riot should "be making cooler more high quality skins for victorious skins" but I do feel like the colour scheme and design of her boomerang blade and some other minor features could have been done better. But that's just my opinion. So think what you want of it, I'm just somewhat disappointed (hopefully we can see some changes before it come out :D)
Exactly the point I'm trying to make, thankyou.
The only sivir skin i will never get ðŸ˜¢

MFW people complain about free things. You get the skin as a bonus for getting to Gold, as a bonus for being good at the game. I feel like the only people that will be annoyed were those that spent $80 and got a boost for the rewards with their mum's credit card. The skin isn't exactly that bad and people should stop complaining about it.

I like the way you put it. The use of a skin spotlight video as justification to represent the entire community is ridiculous, not to mention the likes are greater than the dislikes. In the end it's just an opinion and people should realise that it's not a right to receive the skin, but a privilege.
The skins may be a privilege, no doubting that, but at least make it privilege worthy... It's a reward, make it feel rewarding.

It's a form of justification, I can't incorporate the entire community. The like and dislike bar isn't solely representative of peoples opinions on the skin, it could be the video format, the quality, the length, the thoroughness of the spotlight; who knows? My point I was trying to make was is that if you have a look at the other champion skin spotlights made by that same YouTube channel, you can see that approximately 95% + people constantly like the videos, and the videos are always made the same way, with the same format. Because of this, when the dislikes all of a sudden reach approximately 45% of the total likes/dislikes, then what's changed? The skin, the skin is the only thing that has changed. Using this video as a justification method is reasonable considering the circumstances. Also, if you take a quick glance at the poll you may be also able to see the community tending to agree with my opinion.

No, I'm complaining about it being bad in comparison to other years. Other years were sweet, but this one isn't. And, to be honest, it isn't a 'bonus' to those who play the game solely for the rewards at the end of the year. What about the people that simply just put in the hard yards recently? As in, what about those that were low silver/bronze and then climbed their way up to Gold only in the past week or so, only to be rewarded with essentially nothing. Rewards are great and all, but they need to feel rewarding.

> [{quoted}](name=PvPRealm,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=QfKK41ss,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-11-01T12:03:47.821+0000)
>
> No, I'm complaining about it being bad in comparison to other years. Other years were sweet, but this one isn't. And, to be honest, it isn't a 'bonus' to those who play the game solely for the rewards at the end of the year. What about the people that simply just put in the hard yards recently? As in, what about those that were low silver/bronze and then climbed their way up to Gold only in the past week or so, only to be rewarded with essentially nothing. Rewards are great and all, but they need to feel rewarding.

This skin is better than what Janna had, heck Elise's looks like trash in-game, as does Morgana's.

With how you act Riot should just scrap this crap and stop giving out free things to undeserving, spoilt, children, like yourself. It's a reward, you don't complain about free things! That's a basic rule about receiving things, you do not complain! Riot isn't going to put much work into a skin they give out, what the hell do you think they are? A charity case? Even if you put in work to get the skin, you still get the damn skin! This community is so garbage if you're going to complain about climbing to Gold and getting  a bad skin in return, wtf lmao, flawed as hell logic.

But then again, it's the skin to celebrate the end of a FUCKING SEASON? It can be a milestone for some, hey, even might feel rewarding? This crap won't feel rewarding... the elise and morgana skin in game look alright, this doesn't. I'm allowed to say my opinion, don't act as if I'm not. Thanks.

> [{quoted}](name=PvPRealm,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=QfKK41ss,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2015-11-01T12:10:12.143+0000)
>
> But then again, it's the skin to celebrate the end of a FUCKING SEASON? It can be a milestone for some, hey, even might feel rewarding? This crap won't feel rewarding... the elise and morgana skin in game look alright, this doesn't. I'm allowed to say my opinion, don't act as if I'm not. Thanks.

No, the skin is to reward decent players, else everyone would get it. If you get it for reaching gold, it's a reward, you imbecile, do you not know what rewards are? You're the person who downvoted my post because it didn't agree with what you had said. You can have an opinion, but so can others. Now grow up and read a dictionary, God bless you.

You based that whole last paragraph on the fact you assume I don't know the definition of 'reward'? Congratulations, you may be the most picky individual I've ever met online...  The skin is to reward decent players at the end of a season. I never down voted a post, I don't do that... You can have your opinion, I didn't try to restrict you from that right; however you did to me. Assumptions are a killer aren't they?
I liked it :p
This entire thread is so aggressive and your just "I liked it" :D

> [{quoted}](name=Nao Tomori,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=QfKK41ss,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-11-01T13:06:05.020+0000)
>
> This entire thread is so aggressive and your just "I liked it" :D

touche , good sir :P

I dont like to be violent
Zac 4 the win
It looks Awful, dont try to explain yourselves. Compared to Elise and yeah, nothing good about this skin
Yep

Okay first of all, downvoted for shitty linking. Why? Why in the fuck would you link splash art of EXISTING skins from non-Riot sources? There is no fucking sense in that.

As someone who has every Sivir skin (including PAX Sivir) and has been playing Sivir since season one, I love the Victorious Skin. It's unfortunate that I didn't climb to gold earlier in the season because there is no hope in doing so now with the end of season cluster fuck.

i didnt notice but you're right. they shouldve made the new kass skin victorious kassadin haha, it seems more appropriate and fitting, but then we'd be stuck with the shitty non-free sivir skin that yet again has nothing to do with straya
